en: Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), 1783-4, The Wallace Collection

Some additional images which are referred to in the Catalogue entries of the Technical Bulletin can be viewed by following the links below.

  • Thomas Watson, after Joshua Reynolds, The Strawberry Girl, 1774. Mezzotint. 37 x 27.6 cm. The British Museum, Inv. 1840,0808.130.

en: M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), , 77 x 63.5 cm.  The Wallace Collection. (7382x5508px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), paint cross-section from rocky foreground.  The Wallace Collection. (972x4164px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), paint cross-section from rocky foreground, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (972x4164px)

M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph from the imapsted paint of the sleeve near the sitter's elbow, showing the stiff texture of the white paint.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph from purplish/grey brushstroke at the edge of the sitter's sleeve.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph from the bow on the sitter's dress showing peaks of stiff paint.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)

M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph from the shadowed brown fold on the bodice, showing where the wet paint has been dragged across the surface by the subsequent brush stroke.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph from the sitter's eye. The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)

M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph from the red and black brustrokes used for the shadow on the sitter's hair just below her ear.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)

M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph from the dark brushstrokes of the sitter's hair above her forehead. There is some discoloured surface coating caught in the texture of the paint.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic). The Wallace Collection. (9272x7768px)

M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic), with the effect of the painting stretcher reduced by digital manipulation. The Wallace Collection. (9272x7768px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), raking light to highlight surface texture. The Wallace Collection. (6807x5475px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph showing deposit of red paint in sky that has been painted out. The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), paint cross-section from the line of red paint deposited on the sky. The Wallace Collection. (1008x4152px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), paint cross-section from the line of red paint deposited on the sky, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1008x4152px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), paint cross-section from the sky at the left edge.  The Wallace Collection. (576x4152px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), paint cross-section from the sky at the left edge, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (576x4152px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), paint cross-section from the red bow. The Wallace Collection. (852x3876px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), paint cross-section from the red bow, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (852x3876px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph of the sitter's lips. The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph of the rosy flesh paint at the sitter's cheek. The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1403: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Mary Robinson ('Perdita'), photomicrograph of the horizon on the left, showing the patchy remains of a surface coating. The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
